name: discretize
label: Discretize
description: Discretize regular buckets from time series of a dataset

inputs.name: ds_name
inputs.label: DSname
inputs.description: Name of the dataset to discretize

parameters.name: nb_buckets
parameters.description: number of buckets to discretize each timeseries of the dataset
parameters.label: Number of buckets

parameters.name: table_name
parameters.description: Name of the table to create
parameters.label: Table name

outputs.name: result
outputs.label: Table
outputs.description: Table containing all discretized values for each bucket
